Posts.Content: 3survivor wrote: Hi All - I have mets to the bones and I just got finished using Xeloda for about a year and my numbers have been going up.  My Doctor has decided that I need to move on to another drug called ixempra.  Does anyone know about the side effects?  I have read the drug info but has anyone used this drug and can tell me how they felt and what side effects that they have had.  Thanks Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: ixempra 3survivor KiminJax
